about_the_game:
Unleash the power of the dark realms with the Dark Fantasy Variety Pack, a free DLC for your game that introduces a collection of dark fantasy-themed units, mounts, and cosmetic content. Whether you're conquering lands or commanding armies, the dark powers will rise to serve your ambitions.

Key Features

  • Dragon Unit: Command the skies with fire-breathing dragons that terrorize your enemies and turn the tide of battle.

  • Dragon Mount: Equip your most daring generals and faction leaders with majestic dragons as mounts.

  • Dragon Rider Leader Style: Lead your faction as a Dragon Rider, charge the  enemy with the ferocious power of beasts.

  • Zombie Unit: Reinforce your armies with relentless undead soldiers raised from the bodies of fallen soldiers.

  • Ghost Unit: Wield spectral forces as ghostly warriors haunt the battlefield, phasing through enemy lines with supernatural agility.

  • Undead Skin Customization: Customize your faction leaders and units with ghastly undead skin textures, embodying the essence of the dark abyss.

  • Undead Eyes: Add otherworldly eyes to your characters, cementing their place as harbingers of the macabre.

  • Weathered Fur Cape & Iron Shoulder Armor: Enhance your officers’ presence with a ragged fur cape and solid iron shoulder plates.

Faction Editor Integration

All new content can be seamlessly integrated into the Faction Editor, giving you the freedom to create your ultimate dark fantasy kingdom or army.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains mass scale bloody violence, deadly diseases and general themes of death in various ways.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
